description: jQuery plugin source code for class manipulation methods (addClass, removeClass, toggleClass, hasClass) in the jQuery library.

methods.name: addClass
methods.description: Adds one or more classes to each element in the set of matched elements.

methods.name: removeClass
methods.description: Removes one or more classes from each element in the set of matched elements.

methods.name: toggleClass
methods.description: Adds or removes one or more classes from each element, depending on either the class's presence or a boolean argument.

methods.name: hasClass
methods.description: Checks if at least one element in the set has the specified class.
